title: Tellek Garing
author: Tellek Garing
content: Mbappe and Haaland are currently competing to establish themselves as the future super star so who exactly has better statistics among the both of them that can go on to be the future GOAT.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Tellek Garing on September 22, 2023, 11:56:14 AMMbappe and Haaland are currently competing to establish themselves as the future super star so who exactly has better statistics among the both of them that can go on to be the future GOAT.I would say that both of them are equally good in performance while Haaland plays dominantly and is confident with his abilities and is still younger then Mbappe but still we can't ignore the performance of Mbappe either because that guy is also the top level striker any club can have. I believe that both of them could be the future goat but if I have to choose one then that would be Mbappe as I believe he's slightly better than Haaland, and I'm sure that I can be wrong with my choice because Haaland can be better in future and may give a hard time to Mbappe to achieve that title.

comments.author: edmundduke
comments.body: First of all i think this thread should be under the gambling discussion section probably.As for the topic, they are both really good, lets just hope they dont fall to bad influence as many unfortunately do when they get to a very high level and start getting idolized.

comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Erling Haaland possesses greater potential than Mbappe. This isn't just about their personalities but also a player's progress, which is influenced by team support. Currently, it's evident that Manchester City is dominating in all matches, and Haaland stands as their most prolific goal-scorer.Mbappe, on the other hand, remains at PSG with a support system more special than Neymar and Messi's. This underscores that PSG isn't a welcoming environment for some individuals. Even the world's best players have experienced situations that necessitated a move to other teams.Is youth a concern? Certainly not. Haaland boasts a superior track record, even in the context of the UEFA Champions League. Haaland could potentially provide a more robust performance with Manchester City than Mbappe with PSG.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: bayu7adi on September 22, 2023, 12:25:27 PMIs youth a concern? Certainly not. Haaland boasts a superior track record, even in the context of the UEFA Champions League. Haaland could potentially provide a more robust performance with Manchester City than Mbappe with PSG.I think the clubs now is a factor to compare the two world class players. Manchester city is in firing top form and I think that is also instrumental for the Norwegian striker.  Erling Haaland no doubt has all the potentials including speed, his youthful strength or his placing or positioning and likewise kylian mbappe possess all those too. Maybe we have to give both time to metamorphose into the super star comparison we want to see. Probably they could replace the duo of Christiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi .

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Tellek Garing on September 22, 2023, 11:56:14 AMMbappe and Haaland are currently competing to establish themselves as the future super star so who exactly has better statistics among the both of them that can go on to be the future GOAT.The comparison is now moving from Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo to Kylian Mbappe and Erling Haaland. Both of them started their professional football almost the same time but the Frenchman has achieved much more than the Norwegian.  In terms of goals, assists, and trophies,  Mbappe is shown Haaland. The Mancity striker can score goals but he hardly creates goal-scoring opportunities. But Mbappe on the other hand is a playmaker, goal creator, and goal scorer. Mbappe would have performed better or he was in a club like Manchester City. But Haaland is better in terms of character.  Mbappe sometimes feels superior and can be stubborn but Haaland is always well-behaved. If Mbappe gets a better club and works on his bad behavior, he will be the GOAT in football in a few years.

comments.author: Wend
comments.body: Quote from: bayu7adi on September 22, 2023, 12:25:27 PMErling Haaland possesses greater potential than Mbappe. This isn't just about their personalities but also a player's progress, which is influenced by team support. Currently, it's evident that Manchester City is dominating in all matches, and Haaland stands as their most prolific goal-scorer.Mbappe, on the other hand, remains at PSG with a support system more special than Neymar and Messi's. This underscores that PSG isn't a welcoming environment for some individuals. Even the world's best players have experienced situations that necessitated a move to other teams.Is youth a concern? Certainly not. Haaland boasts a superior track record, even in the context of the UEFA Champions League. Haaland could potentially provide a more robust performance with Manchester City than Mbappe with PSG.Technically, I think Mbappé will be much superior. The current potential is, like you said, Haaland is getting support from his Manchester City teammates. In addition, Pep Guardiola can exploit Erling Haaland's full potential. Pep Guardiola is a good teacher. But for example, Haaland alone carries the whole team like Mbappé. I bet we won't see a trace of him in the match.If Mbappé goes to Real Madrid in the upcoming transfer season, Mbappé will develop more comprehensively. I believe that in the future, he will be a goat. But time is running out for Mbappé, and he should be decisive with PSG and not try to sink deeper into the quagmire.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: For me, I think it will be Mbappe based on the current statistics, he has the edge over Haaland and he has better goalscoring and assists record both per game and overall. He has scored 287 goals and provided 117 assists in 396 games while Haaland has scored 219 goals and provided 45 assists in 269 games. Mbappe has spent his entire career in Ligue 1 which is generally considered to be one of the top 5 leagues in Europe while Haaland has played in slightly weaker leagues.https://www.msn.com/en-in/sports/football/kylian-mbappe-the-ridiculous-statistics-of-a-forward-who-could-finally-win-it-all-with-psg/ar-AA12S1Kp

comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Quote from: Wend on September 22, 2023, 01:26:02 PMTechnically, I think Mbappé will be much superior. The current potential is, like you said, Haaland is getting support from his Manchester City teammates. In addition, Pep Guardiola can exploit Erling Haaland's full potential. Pep Guardiola is a good teacher. But for example, Haaland alone carries the whole team like Mbappé. I bet we won't see a trace of him in the match.If Mbappé goes to Real Madrid in the upcoming transfer season, Mbappé will develop more comprehensively. I believe that in the future, he will be a goat. But time is running out for Mbappé, and he should be decisive with PSG and not try to sink deeper into the quagmire.My concern is whether, should Mbappe depart from PSG, he will receive the same special treatment at another club as he has at PSG. The support for Mbappe seems to be unique to PSG, and if he were to move to another major club, the authority within his contract would likely be more limited, and he would become just another player.It's akin to Messi's move to PSG, where Messi received immense support from Barcelona, but it seems less pronounced at PSG.On the other hand, Erling Haaland garners support because he isn't overly flamboyant. Haaland, regardless of where he goes, is likely to maintain the support of his teammates because of his exceptional qualities from within. That's why I've chosen Haaland.

comments.author: David Gabriel
comments.body: Mbappe has an advantage over Halaand because of his national team. Halaand might not achieve as much with Norway, which would limit his football statistics.

comments.author: Uhwuchukwu53
comments.body: Quote from: edmundduke on September 22, 2023, 12:05:07 PMFirst of all i think this thread should be under the gambling discussion section probably.As for the topic, they are both really good, lets just hope they dont fall to bad influence as many unfortunately do when they get to a very high level and start getting idolized.I concur to this your saying both are good I like there pattern of football , if politics don't play out one may become the goat naturally but football influence and the politics involved may course some shift on the right person.The comparison for me will work best at the end of this season with their performance though from the current pasta d present record I have not seen any different as both still maintain equalebrum in my view.

comments.author: Mrcool75
comments.body: Kylian Mbappe and Erling Haaland are two of the best soccer players in the current era.  They are constantly playing well and winning matches for their team.  If it is said who will be the future goat between these 2 people then I will say Kylian mbappe.  Because Mbappe has already won a World Cup.  Also he is playing well regularly.
